title: HEALTH SYSTEMS MODELING AND IMPROVEMENT
description: This course is organized around problem-solving frameworks for designing and improving health systems, exploring specific methodologies and their role in organizational change. Tools and techniques from operations management, industrial engineering, statistics, and management sciences, are used to explore common health systems design and management issues, focusing on data requirements and decision-making. Issues that may be explored include demand forecasting, process design, product design, and staffing and scheduling.
